FuncDef: This command associates up to four policies to control the leaking of GRT routes into the associated VPRN.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the route policy name, up to 64 characters or a policy logical expression, up to 255 characters. Values-plcy-or-long-expr: policy-name | long-expr.
Specifies the route policy name, up to 64 characters or a policy logical expression, up to 64 characters long. Values-plcy-or-expr: policy-name | expr.
